definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Bring the photo to the light so we can see it better.
sentences.chinese: 你把相片拿到明處來，讓大家看個清楚。

sentences.english: Sex one-inch colour photos of the students are needed.
sentences.chinese: 需辦理接送卡的學生交家長一寸相片2張。

sentences.english: In a silver frame on the table there is a photograph of her son.
sentences.chinese: 桌上的銀框中有一張她兒子的相片。

sentences.english: Erase and Dodge the edges of the Polaroid picture.
sentences.chinese: 擦除和道奇的邊緣拍立得相片。

sentences.english: Luke took a picture of his family.
sentences.chinese: 盧克給全家照了張相片。
你能夠沖印出很不錯的8x10規格的相片。

sentences.english: A lot of my favorite images are of the over-sized Oscar statues.
sentences.chinese: 我所喜愛的相片裏有不少是大碼的奧斯卡雕像。

sentences.english: A single print or piece of film combining half-tone and line work.
sentences.chinese: 結合半色調網點和線條圖形的相片或菲林。

sentences.english: Recently I put my photos in order and will post them here one by one.
sentences.chinese: 最近抽空整理了一些相片，會將它們陸續傳上來。

sentences.english: May I take a picture of you and you lane baby?
sentences.chinese: 你能照張你和你小孩的相片給我嗎？

sentences.english: You want the Yellow Crane Tower in the picture?
sentences.chinese: 你想將黃鶴樓照進相片嗎？

sentences.english: Miyoko is looking at her pictures from her school trip.
sentences.chinese: 美代子正看着她的學校之旅的相片。

sentences.english: Make a slideshow of your favorite digital photographs.
sentences.chinese: 把你們最喜歡的數碼相片用幻燈片形式播放。

sentences.english: Circulate a monthly release of toilet paper and collection of certificate photos.
sentences.chinese: 協助行政助理每月發放一次紙巾，收集辦證相片。

sentences.english: Then I think if I can find this photo it would be even better.
sentences.chinese: 後來我想如果我能找到這張相片則更好。

definition: head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
